mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbmall_board (member_no , board_title, board_content, board_writedate) VALUES(#{member_no},#{board_title},#{board_content},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbmall_board SET board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_writedate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE board_no = #{board_no} AND member_no = #{member_no}
UPDATE tbmall_board SET board_delete = 1, board_writedate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: SELECT c.board_no, c.member_no, c.comment_content, c.comment_writedate FROM tbmall_comment c INNER JOIN tbmall_board b ON c.board_no = b.board_no WHERE c.board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbmall_comment (board_no, member_no, comment_content, comment_writedate) VALUES (#{board_no}, #{member_no}, #{comment_content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
